properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 6 at 9:22AM EST until February 11 at 8:12AM EST by NWS Tallahassee FL
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia...

Kinchafoonee Creek near 11 E Of Dawson At Pinewood Rd In Lee County
affecting Lee County

The Flood Warning continues for
the Kinchafoonee Creek near 11 E Of Dawson At Pinewood Rd In Lee
County.
* From Saturday evening, or until the warning is cancelled.
* At  8:45 AM Thursday the stage was 7.6 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 13.0 feet.
* Forecast: Rise above flood stage by Saturday evening and continue
to rise to near 13.6 feet by early Monday morning. The river will
fall below flood stage by Monday evening.
* Impact: At 13.0 feet: Minor flooding begins near Dawson. Flooding may
also affect areas downstream near Leesburg.
properties.instruction:
All persons with interest along the river should monitor the latest
forecasts, and be prepared to take necessary precautions to protect
life and property. Do not drive cars through flooded areas. If you
see flood waters: Turn around. Don't drown.

For graphical hydrologic information, please go to weather.gov and
click on your state. Select Rivers and Lakes AHPS under current
conditions and click on your river point.
